## How to use Reveal.js Text Resizer

* Press <kbd>Alt/Opt</kbd> + <kbd>+</kbd> to increase text size

* Press <kbd>Alt/Opt</kbd> + <kbd>-</kbd> to decrease text size

* Press <kbd>Alt/Opt</kbd> + <kbd>0</kbd> to reset the text size
